games.title: Penguin Maze
games.description: Guide a penguin through ice-themed mazes. Difficulty scales as you win!

games.title: Six vs Nine
games.description: Learn to tell 6 and 9 apart with varied fonts and sizes. Get 10 in a row to win!

games.title: Time to Get Up?
games.description: Practice reading digital clocks - is it before or after 6 AM?

games.title: Photo Memory
games.description: Classic memory matching game using your own photos!
